body: Unfortunately {tag=eb1216878b1a4944bd4de0a818d9dfe2}, due to some personal issues, has decided he will be stepping down as developer. He has only been here for a few months but he has certainly made an impact on Avicus. Quite a few things wouldn't of been possible without him so thank you. I'm sure you'll be missed.
body_tagged: Unfortunately Kashike, due to some personal issues, has decided he will be stepping down as developer. He has only been here for a few months but he has certainly made an impact on Avicus. Quite a few things wouldn't of been possible without him so thank you. I'm sure you'll be missed.
title: Kashike is moving on.
